description:
go-tour: link to translated versions fo the tour

(These ones are up to date. The Korean one still seems stuck at r60.)

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go-tour

LGTM On Jul 22, 2012 3:22 PM, wrote: > Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com, > > Message: > Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, > > I'd like you to review this change to > https://code.google.com/p/go-**tour > > > Description: > go-tour: link to translated versions fo the tour > > (These ones are up to date. The Korean one still seems stuck at r60.) > > Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/**6421059/ > > Affected files: > M static/index.html > > > Index: static/index.html > ==============================**==============================**======= > --- a/static/index.html > +++ b/static/index.html > @@ -79,6 +79,24 @@ > > >
> +

Go local

> +

> + The tour is available in other languages: > +

    > +
  • Brazilian > Portuguese — Português do Brasil
    • > +
  • Chinese > — 普通话
    • > +
  • Japanese > — 日本語
    • > +
> +

> + (If you would like to translate the tour to another language, check > + out the source from https://code.google.com/**p/go-tour > , > + translate static/index.html**, and then deploy it to App > + Engine using the instructions in appengine/README.**) > +

> + Click the "next" button or type PageDown to continue. > +

> + > +
>

Go offline

>

> This tour is also available as a stand-alone program that you can > use > > >

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go-tour/source/detail?r=1e857d41c670 ***

      go-tour: link to translated versions fo the tour

(These ones are up to date. The Korean one still seems stuck at r60.)

R=golang-dev, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6421059

subject: code review 6421059:       go-tour: link to translated versions fo the tour
